fixes.name: Initial Cash USD T (excl Int/FWD)
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR useCustom = SELECTEDVALUE('Use Custom Date'[Display As])
VAR paramEndDate = SELECTEDVALUE('End Date'[Display As])
RETURN
IF(
    useCustom,
    IF(
        'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Max Date] = 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[RpDate]
        && 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Is Internal ? (group)] = "external"
        && 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Is Forward Start ?] = 0,
        'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Ut. US MM],
        0
    ),
    IF(
        'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[RpDate] = paramEndDate
        && 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Is Internal ? (group)] = "external"
        && 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Is Forward Start ?] = 0,
        'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Ut. US MM],
        0
    )
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the Tableau IF/ELSEIF logic into DAX using VARs for parameter values (SELECTEDVALUE for each Tableau parameter). All column references were transformed to the 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Column] format. String literal "external" preserved. The two conditional branches mirror the original nested IFs and return [Ut. US MM] or 0 accordingly.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation references parameters ([Parameters].[Use Custom Date] and [Parameters].[End Date]); per rules, any formula that uses parameters must be created as a measure.
